Articles.Content: I can't wait for even for a 1.1 compatible pre-release ! I just enjoy using this mod

@Jagzeplin and @simalto Just go to the GitHub and click on the release links.  It shows 46 and the latest is 5.3 released about 12 hours ago.  The devs probably have not had a chance to update the forum.
it calls it "source code". does that install the same? sorry im a bit of a luddite with code stuff. rudimentary PC skills by the standards of this forum

2 hours ago, tedingus said:

@Jagzeplin and @simalto Just go to the GitHub and click on the release links.  It shows 46 and the latest is 5.3 released about 12 hours ago.  The devs probably have not had a chance to update the forum.

That's not a 1.1 upgrade, folks. Check the description of what changed.

-c
oh. good thing i didnt try it then

I have released version 5.3.0 of Extraplanetary Launchpads.

Changes from 5.2.95:

  • Updated for KSP 1.1
  • Plug some NRE holes.
  • Remove 64-bit windows lock.
  • Contract titles fixed (thanks to suicidejunkie).
  • Recipe log spam cleaned up.
  • Materials on the workbench cleaned up.
  • Dump use of KSPAPIExtensions.
  • EL version moved to the bottom of the build info window.
  • Editor vessel update event handling optimized.
download link times out. Guess your server is under extreme load or otherwise unresponsive. Can you make a binary release available on GitHub? Saves you the bandwidth bills as well
is this mod going to still be on CKAN?  It's not currently available there... er.. hm, probably because it only released for 1.1 very recently at all?

ss8913: I'm sure the CKAN guys will catch up.

jwenting: I was doing some bandwidth intensive stuff and that might have interfeered. EL 5.3.0  already has 61 downloads, so things do seem to be working.
ss8913: There's several mods that I know have 1.1 patches out that aren't up on CKAN yet.   They can be a bit slow on the update at times.  Must be the same folks that maintain the Debian repos.

I see there is a .version file included, but this isn't showing up in AVC.  Looks like a lot of stuff is missing from the .version file, and while the build version is correct, the KSP version it shows is 0.90.  Not sure if that was intentional or not, but I figured I'd let you know.

I think this mod doesn't work with 1.1 yet. I get a message that I have an outdated mod whenever I start the game and when I put a rocket parts container in my craft it just crashes the game everytime (tested 3 times)

Edit: Version 5.3.0

Edit2: Took out the mod and crashed in the same way. Sorry for the inconvenience, I think the problem is somewhere else.

When I add the new version of this mod into KSP 1.1 it says incompatible mod detected, but I see the newest version says it's been updated for 1.1, should I just ignore that warning.

JJE64: oops, I had completely forgotten that file even exists, let alone how it gets generated

vardicd: probably the incorrect EL.version. Are you using AVC?

Same issue with "incompatible mod" detected, but only if I launch 64bit KSP; 32bit KSP doesn't complain. No issues that I've found yet with the mod on 32bit...

Only mods I have are Mechjeb 2.5.7, EL 5.3, and modual manager 2.6.22 (all fresh installed because 1.1)

Only mods I have are Mechjeb 2.5.7, EL 5.3, and modual manager 2.6.22 (all fresh installed because 1.1)

 

4 hours ago, vardicd said:

I'm using version 5.3.0. not sure what AVC is, I think its the bits in the beginning that pop up and say hey this mods got an update. If that's what it is then yes I am using those for mods that have that feature.

 

The reason for this message is because the mod is still checking for 64 bit KSP and flagging it as incompatible. The source shows one missed "IsWin64()" check in the popup dialog area of the Checkers.cs file. It is a simple fix that I'm sure will get updated soon, but in the mean time it shouldn't cause any real problems.
I thought I removed that 64-bit check entirely. It appears I missed one spot. Sorry guys. However, EL should work just fine anyway (if not, do holler!).
download for 1.1 ?

5 minutes ago, woo_reentry_is_cool_dude said:

download for 1.1 ?

Right in the OP.  Hint it's the link where it says "Download".

Ok so this may have been stated before, but heck there are almost 150 pages here so im just gonna come out and ask.

Im finding the Orbital Shipyard and the Launchpad, but cant seem to find the Runway. Was it removed or am i just missing something?

It should be there, though "Orbital Shipyard" implies you might have some other mod installed. If it's USI, then most of EL's parts will be hidden as USI replaces them.

Anyway, in the VAB or SPH, parts list, somewhere below the science button (depends on installed mods), you should find an EL button. Click that to show only EL parts (anything using and EL module or resource). Scroll down and you should find the runway just before the smelters and survey stake.
Yea ive got usi and your icon isn't there for me. Hmm, I'll have to work on that when I get home, and possibly message Rover about it to see if he's suppressing it
